be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.controllers.project

Class ListProjectsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.controllers.project.ListProjectsController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ListProjectsViewController.Listener, java.util.Observer

    public class ListProjectsController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ListProjectsViewController.Listener, java.util.Observer
    ListProjectController class handles one action directly, deletion, in the projects list UI, and delegates the addition and modification of a project to ProjectController, as well as the handling of tasks of a project to TaskController.
